channel.title: How let NPC's drop?
channel.description: Hi, How i let npc's drop items when i kill? Greetings, One Living

item.title: How let NPC's drop?
item.dc:creator: @Skull_Face72 Skull Face72
item.description:
@Skull_Face72 wrote:

[quote author=gameboy627 link=topic=32461.msg388828#msg388828 date=1162521003]

[quote author=Skull Face72 link=topic=32461.msg385875#msg385875 date=1162447954]

[quote=“gameboy627, post:4, topic:21323”][quote author=NickMoran06 link=topic=32461.msg383938#msg383938 date=1162429838]

[quote author=gameboy627 link=topic=32461.msg383897#msg383897 date=1162429454]

Hi,
How i let npc’s drop items when i kill?
Greetings, One Living
[/quote] you saying you know how tell me!!!

He’s asking a question… They drop automatically but you only get Dwarf Remains 90% of the time
[/quote] dwarf remains aren’t even real items in the main game aka runescape[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:35:24 PM[/size][hr][quote author=NickMoran06 link=topic=32461.msg383938#msg383938 date=1162429838]

[quote author=gameboy627 link=topic=32461.msg383897#msg383897 date=1162429454]

Hi,
How i let npc’s drop items when i kill?
Greetings, One Living
[/quote] you saying you know how tell me!!!

He’s asking a question… They drop automatically but you only get Dwarf Remains 90% of the time
[/quote] i know that you u can change there drop someho[quote author=gameboy627 link=topic=32461.msg384055#msg384055 date=1162431354]

[quote author=NickMoran06 link=topic=32461.msg383938#msg383938 date=1162429838]

Hi,
How i let npc’s drop items when i kill?
Greetings, One Living
[/quote] you saying you know how tell me!!!

He’s asking a question… They drop automatically but you only get Dwarf Remains 90% of the time
[/quote] dwarf remains aren’t even real items in the main game aka runescape[br][size=1]
yes they are during dwarf cannon quest duh

was that nessecery?[/quote]ya

Read full topic
